MajorClaims.Text: its better that people learn foreign language in their own country

Claims.Text: It is cost effective and there is a pool of opportunities available now to accomplish the same
with the advent of globalization, one can easily find a teacher in their own country
it is not possible for everyone to visit a foreign country to learn a foreign language
it is very easy to learn a foreign in our own country
technology has also played a great role in reducing the separation between learning a foreign languge in our own country

Premises.Text: In the earlier periods, it was not easy to find a teacher to learn a foreign languge
in Indian sub-continent there are large number of centers opened for getting trained in variety of languages like french, german etc
it requires large amount of money and legal formalities
Students can choose any language from the set of languages available at a university
colleges and universities have introduced foreign language course as a part of their curriculum
highly qualified foreign language teachers are easily accessible in various schools and colleges
A large number of foreign language courses are available online and there are various forums where people can discuss their problems on different foreign languages
